participants.name: Jerrod Bailey
participants.title: ClickIPO: Democratizing IPOs - Cofounder and President

messages.message:
Hey Brian, I don't know if you remember me, but I'm a local startup founder, and I'm good friends with Stephen Houghton, Erik Twist. Another friend of mine runs the EdTech company, Weave (WeaveEducation.com), and he's going to be in Phoenix next week. He'd like to meet you.

Do you mind if I connect you guys?

-Jerrod

Jerrod Bailey
Cofounder at ClickIPO Holdings
ClickIPO.com
P +1.480.442.8444 | jerrod@ClickIPOHoldings.com
I would love for you to connect us. I am even looking for a job! Stephen and Erik are some of the kindest most genuine people I know, thank you for thinking of me! :)

Yeah, agreed. I'm going to intro you to Jesus Ramirez. He's one of the guys I respect the most in the industry. PS, I already talked to Stephen and Erik about reaching out to you (just to get their blessing). So we're all good!
